attributes.action: give the public their say and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to call an election this summer to allow the general public to express their view on who should run the country.  There are so many current issues including expenses and the credit crunch that it is appropriate that the public have a say in who should be leading the country forward at this time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
